Job Description:



Company: To Be Connected

Location: Remote – Working CET Hours

Salary: USD $1,000 per month (Paid Bi-Weekly)



About To Be Connected



To Be Connected is a Netherlands-based IT services company founded in 2007. We specialize in providing technical solutions and support to large retail chains both in the Netherlands and internationally. Our services cover a wide range of technical support and infrastructure solutions designed to keep enterprise retail environments running efficiently.



Role Overview



We are looking for an experienced IT Second Line Support to join our international support team. This role focuses on handling escalations from our First Line Support team and working on more advanced technical issues, as well as contributing to longer-term technical projects based on your expertise.



You will be working in a collaborative, multicultural environment with tea
mbers primarily located across Europe and Southeast Asia.



Key Responsibilities



Provide second-line technical support for escalated service desk tickets

Troubleshoot and resolve complex hardware, software, and system issues

Support and collaborate with the First Line Service Desk team

Participate in technical projects and infrastructure improvements

Maintain clear documentation of issues and resolutions

Work independently while collaborating with international teams

Working Hours



Standard working hours aligned with Central European Time (CET)

Occasional weekend work may be required (open for discussion)

Requirements



Minimum 5 years of experience in a Second Line Service Desk or similar technical support role

Demonstrable knowledge of:

Windows-based systems

iOS-based systems

Android-based systems

Knowledge of IT infrastructure is considered a strong advantage

Ability to work independently and manage workload effectively

Strong problem-solving and communication skills

Comfortable working in an international team environment

What We Offer



Salary of USD $1,000 per month, paid bi-weekly

Opportunity to work with major international retail organizations

Collaborative and diverse international team

Exposure to advanced technical projects and enterprise environments

Job Type: Full-time

title: Graphic Designer – Static & Native (Ugly) Ads
description:
About the Company



Allipse Marketing Management owns and operates multiple direct-to-consumer brands in the US market, specializing in health, beauty, and wellness. We sell products that solve real problems for real customers.



We’re now looking for a Graphic Designer who can create high-performing static ads AND native-style “ugly” ads for Meta and TikTok — creatives that blend into the feed, stop the scroll, and drive conversions.



About the Role



This role is not about making things “pretty.”

It’s about making creatives that sell.



You’ll design:



Clean, high-converting static image ads



Raw, native-style ugly ads that don’t look like ads



You’ll work closely with copywriters and creative strategists to turn hooks, angles, and scripts into visuals that perform. If you understand direct response design and know when polished works vs when ugly wins, this role is for you.



What You’ll Be Designing



Direct response static ads (image + text overlays)



Native / ugly image ads (raw, unpolished, feed-blending creatives)



Before / after comparison ads



Testimonial and review-based creatives



Screenshot-style, notes-style, WhatsApp-style ugly ads



Headline-driven clickbait ads



Educational infographic-style ads



Hook-first scroll stoppers for cold traffic



What You’ll Own



Design static and ugly ads from briefs and copy (no hand-holding)



Create multiple variations for A/B testing (hooks, layouts, formats)



Turn winning formats into repeatable systems across products



Conduct competitor and market analysis to identify winning creative patterns, hooks, formats, and positioning



Use AI tools (including Nano Banana) to generate base visuals for ugly ads when needed



Quickly convert AI-generated visuals into high-performing ad creatives



Ensure designs are optimized for Meta & TikTok specs



Collaborate closely with copywriters to align message + visual



Fast turnaround on iterations based on performance feedback



Stay updated on what’s working in DTC static & native ads



Who You Are



1+ year experience designing ads for DTC e-commerce



Strong understanding of direct response principles (hooks, hierarchy, CTAs)



Comfortable designing both polished static ads and raw ugly ads



Skilled with Figma, Photoshop, or similar tools



Able to take a concept and execute independently



Fast, reliable, and communicates clearly



Understands that ugly ? lazy, it’s strategic



Bonus (Nice to Have)



Experience using AI design tools (Nano Banana, Midjourney, etc.)



Background in health, beauty, or wellness brands



Familiarity with Meta ad performance feedback loops



Basic understanding of copywriting for ads



You’ll Thrive Here If…



You believe good design = design that converts



You understand when native ugly ads outperform polished ones



You enjoy testing, iterating, and improving creatives



You hate over-designed fluff



You want your work to directly impact revenue



Growth Path



Graphic Designer ? Senior Designer ? Lead Designer ? Creative Strategist



To Apply



Please send:



Your resume / CV



A portfolio of static and/or ugly ads you’ve designed



(If possible) examples of ads that actually performed



A short note on how you approach direct response ad design

title: Content Writer (Lead Magnet & Funnel Support)
description:
We are looking for a content writer who can turn raw ideas into clear, structured marketing assets. 

Our founder regularly records unscripted, idea-heavy videos. What’s missing is someone who can take 

that “brain dump” and shape it into organized, readable, high-quality lead magnets. 



What You Will Do 

? Watch and review recorded video content 

? Extract key insights, frameworks, and teaching points 

? Organize ideas into logical outlines 

? Write polished lead magnets (PDF guides, checklists, frameworks, etc.) 

? Structure content so it is clear, actionable, and easy to follow 

? Prepare drafts ready for design and publishing 

? Collaborate with the founder to clarify points when needed 

? Help maintain consistent voice and tone across materials 



Most projects will range between 10 hours of focused writing. 



What We’re Looking For / Qualifications 

? Strong writing and editing skills 

? Ability to take unstructured input and create organized content 

? Experience writing lead magnets, guides, or educational marketing assets 

? Clear, concise communication style 

? Comfortable working from recorded video rather than detailed briefs 

? Able to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects 

? Bonus: Experience working with founders, consultants, or B2B service businesses 

You do not need to be a subject-matter expert. You do need to be excellent at organizing ideas. 



What We Can Offer 

? Clear direction and strong strategic input 

? Flexible schedule  

? Direct access to leadership for clarity and feedback 

? Opportunity to help build a full marketing and sales system from the ground up 



If you enjoy turning messy ideas into clean, usable assets, this role is for you. Interested applicants may send their updated resume, portfolio and sample works at

title: Short-form Video Editor at Market Leaders
description:
Who We Are



Market Leaders is on a mission to become a world-renowned coaching and marketing education brand by 2031. With Asian roots and global reach, we bring a "Bruce Lee approach" to business education—combining Eastern wisdom with world-class execution.



Our culture? Peaceful & Profitable. We believe in high performance without toxic hustle, building a remote team that wins together and celebrates together.



We're a tight-knit team of 7 scaling globally, and we need a strategic video editor who understands that great content isn't just pretty—it drives results.



The Opportunity



You'll be our Short-form Video Storyteller—the person who turns our ideas into scroll-stopping content that educates, inspires, and spreads our mission across TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



This isn't a cookie-cutter editing gig. You'll produce 30 high-quality videos per month while collaborating directly with our Co-founders (Bryan Ang, CMO + Melvin Soh, Head of Creatives) and Content Manager to shape our viral strategy.



If you've ever studied why Alex Hormozi's cuts hit different, why GaryVee's pacing keeps you hooked, or how Ken Honda makes money mindset feel warm—you'll thrive here.



This role is for someone who:



Sees editing as strategy, not just technical execution

Obsesses over the first 3 seconds (because retention is everything)

Can balance high volume (30/month) with world-class quality

Wants to build something meaningful, not just collect a paycheck



What You'll Do



Video Production & Editing (Your Craft)



- Produce short-form videos monthly across TikTok, Reels, YouTube Shorts

- Execute seamless transitions, motion graphics, and effects that enhance (not distract from) the message

- Ensure every frame reflects Market Leaders' brand—consistent, professional, globally excellent



Viral Strategy & Hook Creation (Your Edge)



- Analyze trending formats weekly and adapt them for business education content

- Create scroll-stopping hooks that grab attention in under 3 seconds

- A/B test thumbnails, captions, pacing, and video structures to optimize performance



Content Optimization (Your Systems)



- Repurpose long-form content (webinars, podcasts, interviews) into snackable short-form gold

- Optimize videos for platform-specific algorithms (what works on TikTok ? Reels ? Shorts)

- Add captions, subtitles, and accessibility features (because inclusive content wins)



Creative Collaboration (Your Team Play)

- Work closely with Content Manager on content calendar and briefs

- Align with Melvin (Head of Creatives) on brand aesthetics and iteration

- Implement Bryan's strategic direction while contributing your creative insights

- Balance input from multiple stakeholders without ego or drama



Performance-Driven Iteration (Your Growth)

- Track what's working (and what's not) based on retention, engagement, and feedback

- Document best practices and create repeatable systems for efficiency

- Stay ahead of platform updates, algorithm changes, and viral trends



What You Bring



Must-Haves (Non-Negotiable)

- Experience & Portfolio

- 2+ years editing short-form content (TikTok/Reels/Shorts specifically—not just YouTube)

- Portfolio with links to your work (show us the videos, the data, the results)

- Proven ability to produce high volume without sacrificing quality (show us you've hit 20-30+ videos/month before)

- Experience in business/education content (coaches, thought leaders, marketing education—not just lifestyle/entertainment)



Technical Skills

- Mastery of video editing software (CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro, DaVinci Resolve—quality matters more than the tool)

- Motion graphics basics (text animations, kinetic typography, smooth transitions)

- Color grading, audio mixing, and pacing that keeps viewers locked in

- Thumbnail design skills (Canva, Photoshop, or similar)



Strategic Mindset

- Deep understanding of TikTok/Reels/Shorts algorithms (you know why some videos explode and others flop)

- Trend-spotting ability—you're on the platforms daily, studying what's working NOW

- Hook psychology—you understand the first 3 seconds make or break retention

- Storytelling in 15-60 seconds—you can compress complex ideas into punchy, engaging narratives



Work Ethic & Execution

- Deadline-driven

- Detail-obsessed—you catch the 0.5-second timing issues others miss

- Organized—asset management, version control, and file naming are second nature

- Self-directed—you don't need hand-holding but know when to ask questions



Cultural Alignment

- You listen first, then take initiative—balancing autonomy with collaboration

- You handle feedback without ego—iteration makes work better, not personal

- You communicate proactively (especially in async remote work)—no surprises, no ghosting

- You understand Asian cultural context + global business education—you can make Ken Honda's philosophy feel as accessible as Gary Vee's energy



Nice-to-Haves (Bonus Points)

- 2D animation skills (moderate complexity—makes you a creative swiss army knife)

- 3D motion graphics (rare unicorn skill—instant standout)

- Copywriting ability (you can punch up captions and hooks)

- Filming/camera work (self-shooting content is a plus)

- Analytics mindset (you track CTR, retention rates, and iterate based on data)

- Agency experience (you're used to client feedback and fast turnarounds)

- Previous work with coaches, educators, or marketing thought leaders (you already speak the language)



Why Market Leaders?



Peaceful & Profitable Culture



We don't glorify burnout. You'll work hard, deliver excellence, and still have a life. Our team prioritizes sustainable performance—no toxic hustle, no drama.



Remote-First, Philippines-Based



Work from anywhere in the Philippines. Flexible hours with core overlap for collaboration. WhatsApp + Zoom + async workflows mean you control your schedule.



Direct Access to Leadership



You'll collaborate daily with our Co-founders (Bryan & Melvin) and Content Manager. Your ideas will be heard, tested, and implemented—not buried in corporate bureaucracy.



Growth & Learning



The short-form content landscape changes every week. You'll be encouraged (and supported) to learn new techniques, test bold ideas, and evolve your craft continuously.



Quarterly Team Retreats



We gather 3-4 times per year across Asia to connect, celebrate wins, and build culture in person. (Yes, we actually like each other.)



Mission-Driven Work

You're not just editing videos—you're helping spread business wisdom that changes lives. Our content educates entrepreneurs globally, blending Asian philosophy with world-class strategy.



Compensation & Stability



- SGD $1,000/month (full-time, remote)

- Freelancers seeking stability: this is your home base

- Senior editors escaping corporate: this is your creative freedom



Apply Now



Ready to turn short-form content into our growth engine?

Here's what to do:

Submit your resume and portfolio to 
 with a subject line : "Short-form Editor - [Last Name, First Name]



Questions?

 us at 
 or reply to this posting.

We respond to every applicant, even if it's not a fit. You'll hear from us.



Market Leaders is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all tea
mbers.



Let's build world-class content together. Peaceful, profitable, and damn good at what we do.

— The Market Leaders Team

title: Media Buyer at Market Leaders
description:
Media Buyer

Company: Market Leaders

Location: Remote (Philippines/Anywhere)

Compensation:
SGD




/testimonial-page





Who We Are



Market Leaders is on a mission: become a world-renowned coaching and marketing education brand by 2031. That's 2,200 days from today.



We're not your typical "hustle culture" startup. We're Asian roots, global reach—think Bruce Lee's philosophy applied to business education. We prove that "Peaceful & Profitable" isn't just a tagline; it's how we operate. High performance, zero drama. World-class results without burning out our team.



We're a lean 7-person remote team building something extraordinary. Our positioning is unique: we bring Asian wisdom (discipline, long-term thinking, respect) to global business education, delivered at world-class standards.



The Opportunity



We're looking for our Growth Architect—the person who will scale our VSL (Video Sales Letter) campaigns profitably and sustainably.



You won't just "run
 ads." You'll be the strategic engine behind customer acquisition. You'll test hypotheses, optimize funnels, collaborate with our creative team, and directly impact our path to becoming world-renowned.



This role is critical. Without profitable acquisition, nothing else matters. With it, we change lives globally.



Growth path: Start managing 2?3K/day in ad spend, scale over 12 months. As we grow, so does your responsibility—potentially building and leading a growth team.



What You'll Do



Campaign Management (Daily)

Manage
/Instagram ad campaigns driving traffic to our VSL funnels

Monitor performance across all ad accounts (currently spending 2?3K/day, scaling to 5K+)

Optimize bids, budgets, audiences, and placements to hit 3.5x+ ROAS targets

Make real-time decisions: pause underperformers, scale winners, test new angles



Strategic Testing (Weekly)

Launch 1-2 new audience tests weekly (cold, lookalike, interest-based)

Collaborate with our Content Director on creative A/B tests (hooks, angles, formats)

Run landing page optimization experiments with our Copywriter

Document learnings and build our "growth playbook"

Funnel Optimization (Ongoing)

Analyze the full VSL funnel (ad ? VSL page ? application ? sales call ? customer)

Identify drop-off points and collaborate cross-functionally to improve conversion rates

Use data to inform creative briefs, landing page iterations, and offer positioning



Scaling (As Performance Allows)

Identify campaigns ready to scale based on consistency and profitability

Implement gradual budget increases while maintaining ROAS (our framework: +20% every 3 days if stable)

Manage risk during scaling—know when to scale aggressively vs conservatively



Reporting & Communication (2x Weekly)

Create Loom video updates (Tuesdays + Fridays) covering: what's working, what's not, why, and next steps

Maintain real-time performance dashboards

Present strategic recommendations in weekly team strategy calls

Translate data into insights that non-marketers can understand



What You Bring



Must-Haves (Non-Negotiable)



Experience:

2+ years hands-on experience managing
/Instagram ad campaigns (ideally for education, coaching, or info products)

Proven track record scaling campaigns to $3K+/day profitably

Deep understanding of VSL funnel mechanics (ad ? video ? application ? high-ticket sale)

Experience managing $50K+/month ad budgets with clear ROAS accountability



Technical Skills:

 Ads Manager mastery (campaign structure, pixel optimization, audience building)

Google Analytics proficiency (funnel analysis, conversion tracking)

A/B testing methodology (statistical significance, test design, documentation)

Basic funnel-building tools (ClickFunnels, Leadpages, or similar)

Data analysis in Google Sheets/Excel (pivot tables, cohort analysis, dashboards)



Analytical Mindset:

You live in data but don't drown in it—you find signal in noise

You understand creative + data synergy (not just "numbers person")

You can explain complex performance trends in simple terms

You make decisions based on evidence, not gut feel alone



Communication:

Crystal clear written communication (Slack, Loom, docs)

Comfortable on video (you'll record regular updates)

Async-first mindset (we're remote across timezones)

You can advocate for your ideas while staying collaborative



Cultural Fit:

High performance, zero drama - You deliver excellent work without creating friction. We have a strict "no brilliant jerks" policy.

Team-first mentality - You celebrate team wins over personal credit. Collaboration > ego, always.

Peaceful & Profitable believer - You've experienced burnout and reject hustle culture. You prove excellent results don't require 80-hour weeks.

Continuous learner - You're evolving constantly. You read, test, learn from failures, and level up relentlessly.

World-class standards - You refuse to ship mediocre work. Quality over quantity, every time.



Nice-to-Haves (Bonus Points)

Experience with YouTube, TikTok, or LinkedIn ads (we're expanding platforms)

Worked with Asian or global multicultural teams (you understand cross-cultural communication)

Built creative briefs for design/video teams (you know how to translate data into creative direction)

Experience in education, coaching, or "expert brand" niches (you get our audience)

Google Ads or native advertising experience (diversification opportunities)

Previous remote work experience (you know how to thrive async)



Why Market Leaders?



Peaceful & Profitable Culture

We mean it. No Slack messages at 2 AM expecting responses. No "always be hustling" toxicity. We build for decades, not quarters. You'll have clear work hours, real weekends, and a team that respects boundaries.



Remote-First, Truly

Work from anywhere in the Asia-Pacific timezone. We meet async via Slack and Loom, with key Zoom calls twice weekly. No micromanagement. We care about outcomes, not hours logged. Trust is our default.



Career Growth Path

Months 1-6: Master our VSL campaigns, scale to $5K+/day, become autonomous

Months 7-12: Own multi-channel strategy (YouTube, TikTok tests), scale to $10K+/day

Year 2+: Build and lead growth team as we scale, become Head of Growth, equity potential



Team & Retreats

You'll work with a small, mighty team: Bryan & Melvin (co-founders, 10+ years building together), Morgan (Content Director, creative genius), Collen (Copywriter, conversion expert), [Other tea
mbers]



Quarterly team retreats (3-4 days, rotating Asian locations—Thailand, Bali, Vietnam, etc.). Fully paid.



Compensation & Perks

Salary:
SGD

Quarterly Retreats: Fully covered (flights, accommodation, activities)

Work-from-Anywhere: As long as timezone overlap works

Equity Potential: For exceptional long-term tea
mbers (12+ months)



Apply Now!

title: Social Media Manager at Market Leaders
description:
Social Media Manager at Market Leaders (Industry Titans)


/testimonial-page



Who We Are

Market Leaders (Industry Titans) helps established coaches, consultants, and service providers become industry authorities using modern AI and marketing strategies. Founded by Bryan Ang and Melvin Soh, we're a Singapore-based company working with ambitious entrepreneurs globally.



Our positioning is unique: Asian roots, global reach—we bring world-class marketing education with cultural authenticity. We're building toward becoming a world-renowned brand by 2031, and social media is a critical growth lever.



Our culture? Peaceful & Profitable—high performance without toxic hustle, zero drama, and a team-first mentality.



The Opportunity

Most companies want social media managers who post pretty content and chase vanity metrics.



We need a growth-driven strategist who turns followers into clients.



You won't just be scheduling posts. You'll be engineering social campaigns that build authority, drive engagement, and convert business owners into high-ticket clients. Your work directly impacts how entrepreneurs building 6–7 figure businesses discover and engage with us.



This role combines three rare skills:

AI mastery for scaling content production efficiently



Paid advertising expertise optimizing campaigns that convert



Community building creating relationships that drive real business results



If you can turn social platforms into client-generating assets while embodying our "Never Stop Evolving" and "High Performance, Zero Drama" values, this is your role.



What You'll Do



Content Creation & Strategic Execution (40%)

Create daily social posts across platforms that educate, engage, and convert

Design scroll-stopping graphics and visual content in Canva

Write compelling captions and copy that drive action

Repurpose existing content for maximum social distribution

Use AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude) to scale production without sacrificing quality



Community Building & Engagement (25%)

Respond to comments and DMs daily, building genuine relationships

Monitor brand mentions and join relevant conversations

Foster community growth through authentic interaction

Identify and engage with potential clients and partners



Paid Advertising & Conversion (20%)

Run and optimize paid social campaigns (Meta, LinkedIn)

Test ad creatives, copy, and audiences systematically

Manage ad budgets and maximize ROI

Track performance and iterate based on data



Analytics & Continuous Improvement (15%)

Track performance metrics weekly and identify trends

Analyze what's working and double down

Implement data-driven improvements

Collaborate with Content Director (Morgan) and Copywriter (Collen) on campaigns

Report insights to CMO (Bryan Ang)



What You Bring

Must-Haves (Non-Negotiable)







Experience & Proof

2+ years managing social media professionally (B2B/business content preferred)

Portfolio required showing account growth, engagement metrics, and campaign results

Proven track record growing accounts and driving measurable business outcomes



Technical Skills

Strong copywriting for social captions and posts

Proficient in Canva and graphic design fundamentals

Hands-on experience running paid social ads (Meta/LinkedIn)

Data analysis skills—you can read metrics, spot trends, and optimize accordingly

Comfortable with AI tools (ChatGPT, Claude) to work smarter and faster



Work Style & Culture Fit

Never Stop Evolving: You learn something new every day and apply it immediately

High Performance, Zero Drama: Professional, reliable, no ego, no excuses

Self-starter who works independently without constant direction

Available for Singapore time zone overlap (GMT+8)

Reliable internet and professional workspace



Nice-to-Haves

Experience in coaching/consulting/education industries

Video editing skills

Understanding of Asian business culture + global markets

Experience with scheduling platforms (Buffer, Hootsuite, etc.)



Why Market Leaders?



Peaceful & Profitable Culture

We believe in world-class results without burnout. You'll work hard and smart, but we respect boundaries and sustainable performance.



Remote-First Flexibility

Work from anywhere in the Philippines. Async collaboration with clear communication norms.



Learn While You Earn

You're joining a marketing education company. You'll be immersed in cutting-edge strategies, AI tools, and world-class marketing thinking daily.



Growth Path

As we scale toward our 2031 mission, high performers grow with us. This role can evolve into Social Media Director, Growth Lead, or other leadership opportunities.



Team Culture

Small team (7 people), big impact. You'll work directly with Bryan (CMO), Morgan (Content Director), and Collen (Copywriter). Quarterly team celebrations and genuine collaboration.



Compensation & Support

Base Salary: SGD $800–1,000/month (based on experience)

Canva Pro subscription provided

AI tools access (ChatGPT, Claude)

Marketing tools and software provided



Our Hiring Process

We respect your time. Here's exactly what to expect:

Application + 3 Quick Tasks (60–90 min total)

60-Second Video Introduction (be yourself, show your energy)

Zoom Interview (60 min with Bryan and team—culture + role fit)

Reference Check (we'll verify with past managers)

Welcome to the Team!



Timeline: We review weekly and respond within 3–5 days. Top candidates hear back in 48 hours.

title: Senior Copywriter
description:
Senior Copywriter at Market Leaders

Fully Remote (Philippines-based preferred) | SGD $900-1,100/month | Full-Time



Who We Are



Market Leaders is on a mission to become a world-renowned coaching and marketing education brand by 2031. With Asian roots and global reach, we're building something different—Peaceful & Profitable. We believe in high performance without toxic hustle, world-class standards without burnout, and teams that win together.



We're a 7-person remote team led by Industry Titans PTE. LTD., and we're scaling fast. If you've ever wanted to write for a brand that blends Bruce Lee's philosophy with modern marketing excellence, keep reading.



The Opportunity



We're looking for a Senior Copywriter who can craft words that convert, inspire, and educate—across
s, blogs, social media, landing pages, and video scripts.



This isn't a "churn out content" role. This is about strategic storytelling that builds trust with coaches and entrepreneurs globally. You'll work directly with our Co-Founder & CMO (Bryan Ang), learn our unique brand voice, and create copy that drives real business results.



If you're a wordsmith who values quality over quantity, loves learning, and thrives on autonomy—this is your role.



What You'll Do



Your day-to-day will include:



- Write
 sequences per month for coach clients (nurture, launch, onboarding sequences)

- Create VSL (Video Sales Letter) scripts for product launches and marketing campaigns

- Develop website copy for high-converting landing pages and sales pages

- Write blog posts weekly (16+ per month) that educate, engage, and rank on Google

- Craft social media copy across Instagram broadcasts,
 posts, and newsletters

- Collaborate with designers to ensure copy and visuals align perfectly

- Manage the content calendar and deliver consistent, on-brand messaging



What You Bring



Must-Haves:



- 3+ years of professional copywriting experience (agency, in-house, or freelance)

- Proven
 copywriting skills - You've written sequences that convert

- Social media copywriting expertise - Instagram,
, newsletters

- Strong command of English - Grammar, tone, and storytelling come naturally

- Portfolio or writing samples - Show us your best work 
s, blogs, ads, landing pages)

- Reliable, proactive communicator - You don't ghost, you deliver on time, you ask smart questions

- Growth mindset - You take feedback well, adapt quickly, and continuously improve

- Detail-oriented - You follow instructions, catch typos, and care about quality

- Use of AI for Copywriting at a high level



Bonus Points (Nice-to-Haves):



- Ad Copy

- Marketing agency background

- Direct response copywriting knowledge (PAS, AIDA, storytelling frameworks)

- VSL or video script writing experience

- SEO copywriting skills

- Experience in coaching, education, or personal development industries



Why Market Leaders?



Peaceful & Profitable Culture



We don't glorify burnout. You'll work hard, deliver excellence, but you won't be expected to sacrifice your life for your job. 

Sustainable performance is our standard.



Fully Remote, Time zone-Aligned

Work from anywhere in the Philippines (or anywhere GMT+8). We're async-first but have 2 Zoo
etings per week to stay connected.



Growth & Learning

You'll be trained on our brand voice, industry knowledge, and internal workflows. We invest in your development because we want you to grow with us.



Team Culture

Small team, big impact. We celebrate wins together (quarterly team retreats!), support each other, and operate with zero drama. No brilliant jerks allowed—skills AND culture fit matter.



Competitive Compensation

SGD $900-1,100/month (approximately PHP 35,000-43,000), paid on time, every time. 

Full-time role with growth potential.



World-Class Standards

Work on projects that matter. Write a copy that's seen globally. Build a portfolio you're proud of.

title: Graphic Designer
description:
Graphic Designer (Ads & Marketing) at Industry Titans





Who We Are



Industry Titans is part of Market Leaders - a global coaching and marketing education brand on a mission to become world-renowned by 2031.



We help ambitious entrepreneurs across Singapore scale their businesses through proven systems. Our roots are Asian, our reach is global, and our culture is Peaceful & Profitable - high performance without the toxic hustle.



We're a 7-person remote team building something world-class. And we need a designer who gets it.



The Opportunity



We're not hiring someone to "make things pretty."



We're hiring a Visual Strategist who understands that design is a business tool - every pixel should serve a purpose, every 

visual should drive results.



Your designs will be the first thing our clients see. You'll create landing pages that convert, social content that stops the scroll, and marketing materials that position entrepreneurs for success.



What makes this different from other design jobs:



Real Business Impact



Your work directly affects client acquisition. You'll see conversion rates, engagement metrics, and revenue impact. When your design works, you'll know.



Learn from World-Class Entrepreneurs



Direct access to proven business strategies, positioning frameworks, and marketing insights from founders scaling to 7-figures.



Portfolio That Sets You Apart



Build work that demonstrates strategic thinking, not just technical skill. Position yourself in the top tier of designers.



Peaceful & Profitable Culture



High standards without burnout. Flexible hours, Sundays protected, results over hustle. We prove excellent work doesn't require sacrificing your life.



What You'll Do



Your Primary Role: Visual Strategist for Business Growth



You're not just executing design requests - you're a business partner who translates complex strategies into compelling visuals that convert.



Daily (60% of Your Time)

Design sales funnel graphics (landing pages, opt-in pages, sales pages)

Create social media content for Industry Titans and client campaigns

Produce marketing materials for consulting offers and programs



Weekly (30% of Your Time)

Develop course materials and presentation decks for client deliverables

Design client success stories and case study graphics

Collaborate with team on campaign strategy and visual direction



Monthly (10% of Your Time)

Analyze performance metrics and optimize designs based on data

Build and refine brand guidelines across platforms

Research design trends in business/consulting space



What Success Looks Like



First 30 Days: Foundation & Integration



Team Chemistry: You vibe with our team dynamics, communicate proactively, ask great questions

Quality Standards: Deliver 5-10 designs weekly that align with Industry Titans brand (2-3 revisions typical as you learn our voice)



Learning Curve: Absorb our positioning, understand our clients, grasp what converts in our market

First 60 Days: Autonomous Execution



Brand Mastery: You own our branding package, maintain consistency without constant supervision



Reduced Revisions: You anticipate feedback, designs hit the mark in 1-2 rounds



Strategic Input: You're suggesting improvements, not just executing requests



Workflow Integration: Seamless collaboration with copywriter and social media manager



First 90 Days: Proactive Partner



Initiative: You're spotting design needs before we ask (event graphics, dashboard designs, campaign assets)



Business Results: Your work contributes to measurable outcomes - higher engagement, improved conversions, professional 

client materials



Efficiency: You've built templates and systems that make our team faster



Culture Carrier: You embody "Peaceful & Profitable" - excellent work, sustainable pace, zero drama



What You Bring



Must-Haves



Experience & Portfolio:

1-2 years professional graphic design experience (marketing/business focus preferred)



Portfolio demonstrating:

Sales funnel/landing page designs

Social media content (ideally with engagement metrics)

Marketing materials for B2B, consulting, or coaching services

Range of styles (we need versatility)



Technical Proficiency:

Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign) OR Figma

AI design tools (Midjourney, DALL-E, ChatGPT for creative assistance)

Basic video editing (Canva Video or CapCut acceptable)



Strategic Mindset:

Understanding of conversion psychology (what makes entrepreneurs click, sign up, buy)

Experience designing with performance metrics in mind

Ability to translate complex business concepts into clear, compelling visuals



Work Style (Critical for Culture Fit):



Coachable: You welcome feedback and iterate quickly - ego doesn't block growth



Autonomous: Self-starter who takes initiative without hand-holding



Communicative: Flags issues early, suggests improvements, asks clarifying questions



Detail-Oriented: Brand consistency is non-negotiable, you catch mistakes before we do



Team-First: You make others look good, collaboration over competition

English Proficiency: Clear communication with team and clients



Nice-to-Haves

Experience in consulting, coaching, or education industries

Copywriting skills (headlines, CTA buttons, social captions)

Motion graphics or basic animation

Understanding of
/Instagram ads manager

Previous remote work experience

Technical Setup Required

Computer capable of running Adobe CC or Figma smoothly

Stable internet (minimum 50Mbps, fiber preferred)

Quiet workspace for video calls when needed

Availability for team collaboration (async-friendly, but some sync overlap helps)



Why Industry Titans?

Peaceful & Profitable (This Is Real)

Flexible Hours: Results matter, not when you work. Family time, gym, life - we get it.

Protected Sundays: Official rest day, no exceptions. Recovery is part of performance.

No Midnight Deadlines: We plan ahead so you're not scrambling. Urgency ? emergency.

Constructive Feedback: We challenge your work to make it better, never to tear you down. Mistakes are learning opportunities.



Remote-First, Results-Driven

Work from anywhere (seriously - beach, cafe, home office, wherever you're productive)

Async collaboration across timezones (we respect your flow state)

Quarterly team retreats (when borders allow - we celebrate wins together in person)



Growth & Learning

Direct Mentorship: Learn business strategy and marketing from Industry Titans founder

Access to Programs: Industry Titans training content and entrepreneur network

Skill Development: See what actually works in high-level coaching/consulting businesses

Portfolio Impact: Work you'll be proud to showcase



Compensation & Benefits

Salary: SGD $800-1,000/month (based on experience level within 1-2 year range)

100% Remote: No commute, no office politics

Team Culture: Quarterly celebrations, supportive environment, diverse perspectives

Career Path: As Industry Titans scales, you scale with us

This role plays a meaningful part in the growth of the company ????

title: Ecommerce Multimedia Designer (Remote with flexible hours)
description:
Founded in 2018 and headquartered in The Netherlands, GTE is on a mission to build the most efficient global direct-to-consumer infrastructure and become the world’s largest e-commerce company—powered by a collective of successful, scalable brands. By end of 2026, we’re aiming to achieve $500 million in revenue and operate over 50 thriving online stores worldwide.



With a team of 160+ top-tier remote e-commerce professionals across the globe, we blend local brand experiences with cross-border logistics, ensuring every customer feels connected—no matter where they are.



At our core, we value hard work, freedom with responsibility, constant improvement, and a mindset of positivity. We believe in building a high-performance, remote-first culture where honesty, excellence, and creativity drive everything we do—because the future of work is global, and we’re building it together;





We’re on the lookout for a Multimedia Designer to join our expanding team and drive our company’s growth!





The Challenge

We’re looking for a Multimedia Designer who can bring speed, creativity, and AI-driven efficiency to our creative team. This role will support in producing product images, website graphics, and assist with AI video creation. The challenge is to deliver high-quality output quickly, reduce the need for revisions, and leverage AI tools effectively to maximize efficiency.



The Impact

By creating better creatives, you’ll directly help our ads and products sell better. With higher production levels at higher quality, your work will enable our media buyers, site managers, and the wider team to move faster and perform more effectively.







We would love to hear from you if…

- You have hands-on experience creating AI product videos and use AI tools daily with advanced techniques for video and image production.

- You bring strong graphic design skills and can deliver high-quality visuals quickly.

- You’re experienced in video editing (After Effects, CapCut) and AI video prompting (JSON, problem-solving).

- You’re proficient with Flora, Kling AI, and JSON prompting techniques.

- You have a premium version of ChatGPT, Claude, or Perplexity (a plus!).

- You’re AI-obsessed, work independently, and have a sharp eye for detail.

 -You’re comfortable in Figma (Auto Layout, Components, Variants).

- You consistently balance speed with quality of work.

 





System Requirements:

- Windows: i5 13th Gen or above, 16GB RAM or above.

- Mac: M2 or above.





Couple of the notes about the role

- This role is an Independent Contractor position, offering flexibility, autonomy, and the opportunity to manage your own schedule while making a meaningful impact on our operations. 

- You must be able to commit at least 8 hours per day, 40 hours per week.

- We require everybody in the team to use Hubstaff to track hours worked.





If you are excited about the opportunity and feel like you are a good fit, we encourage you to apply today here:

title: Full Stack Web Developer (Long-Term / Remote)
description:
About Us:

We are a Swiss digital agency building custom web applications, SaaS platforms, and e-commerce solutions. We work 100% remotely and are looking for a highly skilled Full Stack Developer who can handle complex projects from concept to deployment.



Your Role:

You will take full ownership of technical implementation. You don't just write code – you solve problems. You will build databases, develop backend logic, create responsive frontends, integrate APIs, and deploy applications. We need someone who can handle everything.

Frontend: Modern JavaScript frameworks (React, Vue, or Angular – experience with at least one)



Backend: Strong experience in at least one server-side language (Node.js, PHP, Python, Ruby, or C#)



Databases: SQL (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and NoSQL (MongoDB, Firebase)



Version Control: Git (GitHub/GitLab/Bitbucket)



APIs: REST, GraphQL, third-party integrations



DevOps / Deployment: Linux servers, cPanel, Cloud Platforms (AWS, DigitalOcean, Hetzner, or similar), CI/CD basics



CMS / E-Commerce: Experience with WordPress, Shopify, or headless CMS is a plus



What We Mean by "Full Stack":

You should be comfortable working on:



Database design and optimization



Server setup and maintenance



Backend logic and authentication



Responsive, pixel-perfect frontends



Payment integrations (Stripe, PayPal)



Third-party APIs



Performance optimization and security best practices



Requirements:



You have built and launched multiple complete projects from scratch



Ability to work independently – you don't need hand-holding



Stable high-speed internet connection



Own powerful computer



Overlap with Central European Time (CET): At least 4 hours daily



We Offer:



Long-term partnership: Permanent position after probation



Fair compensation: Paid in USD/EUR via bank transfer or PayPal



Freedom: No micromanagement, results-only work environment

GTE is a fast-growing global eCommerce company where great ideas don’t sit in slides — they turn into real, measurable growth. We build and scale online brands across international markets, and our tea
mbers take real ownership, grow fast, and help shape the future of the company.



We’re now looking for a performance-driven Google Ads Media Buyer to help take our main revenue channel to the next level.



Why This Role Matters



Google Ads drives around 90% of our total company revenue. That means your work won’t just “support marketing”, it will directly influence the growth of the entire business.



This role is perfect for someone who loves improving systems, scaling performance, and turning data into smarter decisions. You won’t just manage campaigns, you’ll help evolve the way we run Google Ads.



What You’ll Be Responsible For

- From day one, you’ll have real ownership. Within your first 90 days, success in this role will mean:

- Developing and rolling out a new or significantly improved Google Ads strategy

- Restructuring and optimizing Google Shopping campaigns for stronger scalability and efficiency

- Driving measurable performance improvements, targeting a 20%+ increase in revenue from Google Ads

- Using performance data to continuously refine bidding strategies, campaign structure, and product feed performance

- Your goal is simple: turn ad spend into scalable, profitable growth.



What We’re Looking For

We’re excited to work with someone who:

- Has at least 3 years of hands-on experience in performance marketing or media buying

- Has direct experience running Google Shopping campaigns for large eCommerce catalogs (10,000+ products)

- Has managed high-budget ad accounts ($300K+ per month)

- Is highly proficient in Google Ads, Google Merchant Center, and Google Analytics

- Ideally has experience with Google CSS Labelizer

- Thinks analytically and uses data to drive decisions, not guesswork

- Enjoys testing, optimizing, and uncovering performance opportunities others might miss

- Is comfortable taking full ownership of results and being accountable for revenue impact



Hiring Process

As part of our process, shortlisted candidates will complete a 19-minute Google Ads knowledge assessment. This helps us understand your hands-on expertise before moving forward to the HR interview stage.



Ready to Grow With Us?

If you’re looking for a role where your work matters, your growth is supported, and your impact is visible — we’d love to hear from you.

title: Full-Time Motion Graphics Video Editor (After Effects – Sports Anatomy Overlays)
description:
Job Overview:

-We are Pro-Active Performance: a U.S.-based golf performance and biomechanics brand that help golfers increase their mobility, strength and golf swing via online rehab and fitness training.  



We are looking for a full-time Motion Graphics Video Editor to create sports-science style content breaking down golf swings using muscle overlays, anatomy tracking, and motion graphics.



You must be experienced in Adobe After Effects (motion tracking, masking, compositing) and Adobe Premiere Pro.



This is NOT a basic video editing role. If you only use CapCut or basic editing software, this role is not for you. 



This is a long-term, full-time position for someone who wants stable income and growth with one brand.



WATCH THIS VIDEO:

*** This is the type of content we are looking to produce: ????????

 
 



What You’ll Do:

-Short Form Content (6-10 per week)

-Edit Instagram/
/ TikTok reels 

-Add captions and pattern interrupts (zooms, transitions, audio effects)

-Track and overlay anatomical muscles onto moving and non-moving golfers (I will provide all anatomy models and clear instructions on the assignment) 

-Pause video to highlight specific muscle overlays, then resume motion 

-Add motion graphics overlays and animated infographic elements to drive engagement



Long Form Youtube (1 video/ week 10-25mins long)

-Visually appealing and retention based editing (especially in the first 10 seconds) 

-Remove filler words and tighten pacing 

-Add animated text, charts and motion graphics 

-Insert B-roll and custom visual elements provided to you 

-Light color correction and audio cleanup 

-Occasional anatomy overlays



Ads (1-4 per week) 

-Create variations from existing content

-Scroll stopping visuals in first 3 seconds that relate to the video

-Clean, professional pacing/ trimming



Youtube Thumbnails

-Design professional Youtube thumbnail related to the video you edited (I will send you inspiration photos of what I’m looking for) 



Additional Tasks (Occasionally)

-Make simple PDFs with aesthetic design on Canva

-Polish internal training videos (remove ums, improve presentation) 



Required Skills (NON-Negotiable): 

-Adobe After Effects (motion tracking, masking, keyframing) 

-Adobe Premiere Pro

-Experience compositing overlays onto moving subjects 

-Strong understanding of motion graphics 

-Proficient English comprehension (reading, writing and communication) 

-Ability to manage your time effectively and meet deadlines consistently.

-A teammate attitude with enthusiasm for helping people and contributing to our mission!



Bonus (Not required but preferred) 

-Basic anatomy knowledge 

-Sports or fitness editing experience



DO NOT APPLY IF: 

-You only edit in Capcut

-You cannot motion track proficiently in After Effects

-You do not have motion graphics examples 

-You are looking for part-time or freelance only 



Position Details: 

-Full Time (40hrs/week)

-Long term role (6+mos minimum)

-Work directly with brand founder 

-Stable weekly pay 

-2 week paid trial before full hire 

-We are looking for someone who wants stability and growth, not multiple small freelance clients. 



Compensation: 

-Monthly salary based on skills and experience 

-Bonuses in addition to salary if you exceed goals  

** Please include your expected monthly salary in your application**

title: Senior Accountant
description:

A high growth U.S.-based F&B franchise is seeking a Senior Accountant to work with the CFO & VP of Finance take ownership of recurring finance operations, reporting, and data workflows across its 200+ franchise business. This role is designed to remove manual, repeatable finance work from senior leaders and introduce more consistency, structure, and scalability into reporting and finance processes.

- Solid understanding of financial statements, especially P&Ls

- Self-starter with creating net-new processes and automations 

- Intense attention to detail

- Exceptionally organized, proactive, and capable of driving tasks to completion with minimal supervision 

- Bachelor Degree or higher (summa, magna or cum laude and/or Academic Scholar from a reputable college preferred)



Preferred: 

- Previous experience working with U.S. restaurant / F&B operators 

- Familiarity with sales tax software (ideally Avalara)

title: Full Time content manager
description:
**About the Role**



We have built a proven AI-powered content system that generates high-performing LinkedIn and social media content at scale. We now need a sharp, hands-on Content Manager to take full ownership of this system — running it day to day, maintaining quality standards, managing client feedback loops, and continuously improving our AI tools and workflows.



This is not a "learn AI from scratch" role. You should already be comfortable working with AI tools like Claude, Gemini, ChatGPT, and visual platforms like Nano Banana. You understand how content actually works — frameworks, hooks, storytelling structures, calls to engage — and you can apply that knowledge to refine AI outputs so they read like they were written by a seasoned strategist, not a machine.



---



**Key Responsibilities**



**Content System Ownership**

- Take full day-to-day control of our AI content generation system, ensuring consistent, high-quality output across all client accounts

- Run content production workflows end to end — from brief to draft to review to delivery

- Maintain and enforce content quality standards, ensuring every piece passes the "could anyone else have written this?" test

- Manage content calendars and delivery schedules across multiple clients



**AI Tool Management & Improvement**

- Work daily with AI tools including Claude, Gemini, ChatGPT, and Nano Banana for visual content

- Update, refine, and improve AI prompts, skill files, and system instructions based on performance data and client feedback

- Identify when AI outputs are falling short and troubleshoot prompt engineering to fix recurring issues

- Stay current with AI tool updates, new features, and emerging platforms that could enhance our workflows



**Client Feedback & Quality Loop**

- Own the client feedback process — collecting, interpreting, and actioning feedback efficiently

- Translate subjective client feedback ("this doesn't sound like me") into specific, actionable AI system adjustments

- Maintain client voice documents and ICP psychology profiles, keeping them updated as understanding deepens

- Ensure revisions are turned around quickly and that recurring feedback themes are permanently resolved in the system



**Content Strategy & Frameworks**

- Apply proven content frameworks (hook formulas, storytelling structures, CTEs, scroll-stopping patterns) to every piece of content

- Understand and implement platform-specific best practices, particularly LinkedIn algorith
chanics

- Contribute strategic input on content themes, angles, and narrative direction for clients

- Identify high-performing content patterns and feed insights back into the system for continuous improvement



---



**Requirements**



**Must-Haves**

- Proven experience managing content production, ideally in an agency or multi-client environment

- Strong working knowledge of AI content tools — you use Claude, ChatGPT, Gemini, or similar daily and understand their strengths and limitations

- Deep understanding of content frameworks: hooks, storytelling structures, CTAs/CTEs, objection handling in copy, authority positioning

- Experience with visual content tools (Nano Banana, Canva, or similar AI image generation platforms)

- Excellent written communication — you can spot when AI copy sounds generic and know how to fix it

- Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple client accounts simultaneously

- Comfortable working with and updating AI prompts, system instructions, and skill files

- Self-starter who takes ownership and doesn't wait to be told what to do



**Nice-to-Haves**

- Experience with LinkedIn marketing specifically (algorithm knowledge, profile optimisation, outreach)

- Background in prompt engineering or AI workflow design

- Familiarity with content performance analytics and reporting

- Understanding of ICP psychology and buyer journey mapping

- Experience with project management tools (Notion, Asana, ClickUp, or similar)



---



**What Success Looks Like**



**First 30 Days:** You've fully onboarded into the content system, understand all client accounts, and are independently running day-to-day content production with minimal oversight.



**First 60 Days:** Client feedback loops are tight and efficient. You're proactively identifying AI output issues and updating prompts/skills to fix them. Quality is consistently high across all accounts.



**First 90 Days:** You own the content function. The system is running smoother than ever, clients are delighted, and you're bringing ideas to the table for new frameworks, better workflows, and expanded capabilities.



---



**Tools You'll Use**



AI Content Tools: Claude, Gemini, ChatGPT | Visual Content: Nano Banana, Canva | Workflow & Ops: Project management platform, Google Workspace, Slack



---



**How to Apply**



Send your application including a brief note on your experience with AI content tools and what excites you about this role. Bonus points if you can show examples of content you've produced or improved using AI.



*We're building something exceptional at the intersection of AI and human-led content strategy. If you're the kind of person who gets excited about making AI work harder and smarter — not just using it — we want to hear from you.*

title: Full-Time Bookkeeper (Xero + Finance Operations Support)
description:
Bookkeeper – Full-Time (Philippines-Based)

eCommerce Brand | Xero | Reconciliation-Focused



We are specifically looking for:

-Preferred: Filipino CPA

-Strong eCommerce background (Shopify, Stripe, PayPal, marketplaces)

-Fully available for full-time work (40 hours/week, no side engagements)

-strong in reconciliation and accounting fundamentals



Company Overview

We are a fast-growing eCommerce brand seeking a disciplined, detail-oriented Bookkeeper to manage day-to-day finance operations. The focus is clean books, accurate reconciliations, and structured finance workflows inside Xero.

This is a long-term, full-time role for someone Philippines-based who understands how eCommerce transactions flow through accounting.



Role Summary

You will maintain accurate financial records in Xero, perform consistent reconciliations, track accounts payable, and support month-end processes. You will work directly with the Financial Controller and Founder. The expectation is organized, audit-ready books at all times.



Core Responsibilities

1. Reconciliation & Ledger Hygiene (Non-Negotiable)

Help build the Chart of Accounts

Reconcile bank feeds weekly in Xero

Reconcile Shopify, PayPal, and other payment processors

Properly categorize and code transactions (using proper accounts)

Investigate discrepancies and clear suspense/holding accounts

Maintain clean and accurate general ledger records



2. Accounts Payable & Finance Operations

Track supplier invoices and due dates

Maintain AP tracker and payment schedules

Ensure bills and receipts are properly uploaded and documented

Support invoice processing and structured filing systems



3. Month-End Close Support

Assist in month-end closing

Ensure all accounts are reconciled before close

Prepare clean P&L and cash summaries for review

Maintain documentation for tax and compliance purposes

 

Requirements

-Filipino CPA preferred

-Minimum 2–3 years bookkeeping experience

-Strong hands-on experience with Xero



Solid understanding of:

-Accrual-based accounting

-AP and reconciliations

-Revenue recognition vs cash timing (accrual basis)

-Prior experience in eCommerce accounting strongly preferred

-Highly detail-oriented and organized, Able to work independently and meet deadlines

-Strong English communication skills

-Must be available full-time (40 hours/week)



To Apply

Please include:

1.	Brief summary of your bookkeeping experience

2.	Specific examples of your Xero work

3.	Description of your eCommerce accounting experience

4.	Your expected monthly salary

5.	Confirmation that you are available full-time

6.     Copy of your resume



We are looking for someone who treats reconciliations seriously, understands accounting flows, and can maintain disciplined financial records in a growing eCommerce environment!
